promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young legendary parrot normal-type wearing opal gemstones. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or normal. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Opalorn, a chibi young legendary parrot normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: thrash, power-shift. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word parrot or normal or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, parrot-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, bright lighting
generatedDescription: Opalorn is a chibi legend! Pecking around villages and gardens, it loves to fly and explore. Possesses unique powers - thrash and power-shift ...
